Package org.sibermatica.io.drivers

Class Driver

java.lang.Object
org.sibermatica.io.drivers.Driver
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public abstract class Driver extends Object implements Serializable

Driver

This class is designed to handle devices. It implements real-time updating and synchronized functions.

WARNING: This class it is not finished! Please, use with caution.
